rule: Terms for specific topics refer to precise subjects or areas of interest related to the content of the input text.
input: Focus areas: machine learning and artificial intelligence.
coverage:
Company names: 
People names: 
Specific topics: machine learning, artificial intelligence
General themes: technology, innovation
validityText:
The input is a string containing a passage of text, "Focus areas: machine learning and artificial intelligence." It fits the input specification provided for the chatbot, which requires the input to be a string containing a passage of text. This input string includes specific topics, namely machine learning and artificial intelligence, which aligns with the input specification that allows for the inclusion of specific topics and general themes relevant to the content. There is no violation of the input specification as the criteria for including relevant content in the passage of text are met.

OK
